title: World Series: Catcher Christian Vazquez Helps Guide Astros to No-Hitter
description: Christian Vázquez is still relatively new to the Houston Astros but he helped guided his team’s pitching staff to the second no-hitter in World Series history.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Astros catcher Christian Vázquez became one of only two catchers in history to call a no-hitter in the World Series.
